nodes.text: The Marquis was a landspeeder model produced by Korrealis Systems during or after the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.

The Korrealis Marquis was first added to Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire, a 2015 expansion to the massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, as one of the items in the Anarchist's Alliance Pack.
